tools.name: search_metadata
tools.description: Search for metadata in the OpenMetadata catalog

parameters.description: The search query to find metadata in the OpenMetadata catalog, entity type could be table, topic etc. Limit can be used to paginate on the data.

entity_type.description: Optional entity type to filter search

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: get_entity_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific entity

parameters.description: Fqn is the fully qualified name of the entity. Entity type could be table, topic etc.

fqn.description: Fully qualified name of the entity

glossary.description: Glossary in which the term belongs. This should be its fully qualified name.

owners.description: Glossary Term owner. This should be an OpenMetadata User

tools.name: patch_entity
tools.description: Patches an Entity based on a JSONPatch. Beforehand the Entity should be validated by finding it and creating a proper patch.

entityFqn.description: Fully Qualified Name of the Entity to be patched.
